word: My brother, you cannot be what you should be physically unless you exercise the powers of your being equally. . . . The Lord is your Helper and your God. He desires to take your case in hand, and He will cooperate with you, as you put in working order brain, bone, and muscle. Will you take this prescription of the great Physician?--Letter 160, April 30, 1907, to Brother and Sister J. A. Starr.
